Class YarnUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.continuuity.weave.yarn.utils.YarnUtils

public class YarnUtils
extends Object

Collection of helper methods to simplify YARN calls.

Temporary workaround since older versions of hadoop don't have the setCores method.

Parameters:
resource -
cores -
Returns:
true if virtual cores was set, false if not.

                                                                           throws IOException
Helper method to get delegation tokens for the given LocationFactory.

Parameters:
config - The hadoop configuration.
locationFactory - The LocationFactory for generating tokens.
credentials - Credentials for storing tokens acquired.
Returns:
List of delegation Tokens acquired.

Decodes Credentials from the given buffer. If the buffer is null or empty, it returns an empty Credentials.
